thread.title: WATCH: Women Talk About How Guns Save Lives, Including Their Own
thread.title_full: WATCH: Women Talk About How Guns Save Lives, Including Their Own

author: Katie Pavlich
title: WATCH: Women Talk About How Guns Save Lives, Including Their Own
text:
Share Tweet 
Over the weekend I had the absolute privilege of moderating a panel of female gun owners at the 2017 Conservative Political Action Conference. 
Ashley Lundvall, Kimberly Corban, Antonia Okafor and Kristi McMains all have their own stories of perseverance and survival, which they generously shared with the audience. Guns save lives and these women know first hand that fact is true. 
Watch below:
